amendment.description: To authorize grants to carry out programs to provide education on preventing teen pregnancies, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4689 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 48 - 51. Record Vote Number: 214.

action.text: Amendment SA 4689 proposed by Senator Lautenberg. (consideration: CR S8153-8164) To authorize grants to carry out programs to provide education on preventing teen pregnancies, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4689 proposed by Senator Lautenberg.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 4689 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 48 - 51. Record Vote Number: 214.
